Reviews.Title: The Android phone as it should be
Reviews.Author: Abdulla Fakhroo
Reviews.Content: - Solid quality (best implementation of plastic that makes aluminum jealous).- Attractive design (departure from small, medium, large, X-large, XXL and XXXL sizes of the exact boring design).- OS simplicity (IOS alike simplicity away from annoying and useless Samsung features).- Utilized storage (no software/features garbage).- All-in-one device (the only device that is needed besides a notebook).- Productivity enabler (large screen that makes Internet browsing, email checking, youtube watching, corporate login and office suites use enjoyable on such device).- Seamless application (no brainer installation and easy to use features in both Windows and Mac flavors).- Tolerable weight (barely feels it in pocket).- Lasting battery (above average continuity in comparison to many other phones).- Excellent price (considering the features above and the latest processor power available on market).- Excellent supplier (no hassle lightening fast delivery in great packaging).Finally a perfect device that replaces my iPhone 5, Samsung Mega 6.3 and iPad Mini all together. Really love it, hope that Sony continues offering future models of this series forever.

Reviews.Title: You get the screen at the sacrifice of some other things
Reviews.Author: Taurean
Reviews.Content: While the screen is amazing, it does a number of things poorly.  The user's ability to control it is hindered.  It does not support voice commands and inputs.  The camera seems completely out of place.  For a product from a company founded on sound, it has a really poor speaker.

Reviews.Title: is that a phone in your pocket?? Or are you just happy to see me????
Reviews.Author: JetLan
Reviews.Content: Pretty sweet phone. feels super classy.. but when it comes down to it- its HUGE!! yeah I knew what i was getting myself into buying it- but when it comes down to it- its cool for a week until you just can't do anything but literally *carry it* in your hands.. everywhere! Yes- your pocket days are over with this phone my friends! Also- Sony is still just a little behind in the game. I had tiny glitches out of the box. But hey! all you android fans are use to that!! Anyways- Im happy with a new gold iPhone 5s
